author: Adrian Collins
description:

Fletcher saw us able to start an actual novella line of publications, with Casthen Gain by Essa Hansen releasing on the 28th of July […]

title: In the Shadow of their Dying shortlisted for a World Fantasy Award!

author: Robin Marx
description:
Emotionally adrift after the death of his pirate queen Bêlit, Conan wanders his way aimlessly through the jungles of the Black Kingdoms. An encounter with a pampered princess from Ophir once again gives him purpose, however. After rescuing her from an attempted human sacrifice, Conan and his loyal tribe of Bamula warriors journey northward, hoping […]

title: REVIEW: Conan the Barbarian #21
